message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product for $13,000.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for a high-quality item.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $11,000, but I'm willing to pay $9,500. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
